Title: Relates to penalties for owners of property who fail to file a proper or timely rent registration statement
Summary: Relates to penalties for owners of property who fail to file a proper or timely rent registration statement.
LawCode: Amd ยง12, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; amd ยง26-516, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four, and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to penalties for owners of property who fail to file a proper or timely rent registration statement
